about_the_game:
Sixty Jumps to Ceres is a strategy-roguelike game set in the asteroid belt of our solar system. You are the captain of a spaceship sent on a dangerous mission to Ceres, the largest object in the belt.

With turn-based movement, you travel across the star map. The map is randomly generated, making each game run a new experience. Random encounters on your journey require you to make tough decisions. Do you avoid conflicts, intervene to help the helpless, or seek your own advantage?

Engage in pausable real-time combat against enemy ships, playing at your own speed. Try to get stronger as you progress deeper into increasingly hostile space. Upgrade your ship with powerful new systems that you find, buy, or capture. However, finding a good system layout can be tricky since space in your ship is limited and not all combinations of systems work equally well.

You need both luck and skill to survive and fulfill your mission, for mistakes can be lethal, and death is irreversible in this game.

Sixty Jumps to Ceres is a strategy-roguelike game set in the asteroid belt of our solar system. You are the captain of a spaceship sent on a dangerous mission to Ceres, the largest object in the belt.

With turn-based movement, you travel across the star map. The map is randomly generated, making each game run a new experience. Random encounters on your journey require you to make tough decisions. Do you avoid conflicts, intervene to help the helpless, or seek your own advantage?

Engage in pausable real-time combat against enemy ships, playing at your own speed. Try to get stronger as you progress deeper into increasingly hostile space. Upgrade your ship with powerful new systems that you find, buy, or capture. However, finding a good system layout can be tricky since space in your ship is limited and not all combinations of systems work equally well.

You need both luck and skill to survive and fulfill your mission, for mistakes can be lethal, and death is irreversible in this game.
name: Sixty Jumps to Ceres
short_description: In this strategy-roguelike game, you command a space ship on a desperate last mission in the asteroid belt. Negotiate, battle your foes, and upgrade your ship. Get stronger as you progress into increasingly hostile space. Only the boldest, most skilled captain will make it to Ceres. Will you?
